pkgmetadata.longdescription: # installA package to install pip packages from within code.Requires Python 2.7+, 3.5+Usage:```import installinstall.install('pkg_you_want')# ... after retrieving a requirements.txt from the web or somewhere elseinstall.install('requirements.txt', requirements=True)# ... need arbitary options?install.install('my_pkg', pip_options=['--isolated'], install_options=['--no-clean', '--pre'])```
